item.title: Partial collapse of speed hump near The Landway junction with Main Road, 9th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: LOUDSPEAKER RIG blasting noise 6pm-8.30pm, 9th July
item.description:
A guy has set up a large sound system with DJ equipment on London Fields -has been blasting music (full bass) from 6pm to now (8.30pm) - saw a park officer cycle past and ask them to lower vol but no change. Noise is disturbing to residents
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Martello Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sycamore saplings growing on pavement, 9th July
item.description:
There are sycamore saplings that have self seeded and growing rapidly in the gap between pavement and house on corner of Balcorne Street. They have rooted and cannot be pulled by hand. They will cause damage to street/house if not killed off.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Balcorne Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Electric bikes becoming huge issue for residents, 9th July
item.description:
105 gore Road/further down. issue has been ongoing and is getting much worse. Residents are constantly dealing with masses of electric bikes littering our road making it impossible to park safely. We need a solid barrier marking the END OF THE BIKE AREA.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gore Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
